entry.title: 6/30 - Call for Entries: "Memento Mori"
entry.content:
Target Gallery
üìç ALEXANDRIA, VA, United States
üé® All Visual Arts
üìÖ 06/30/2019 deadline
üí∞ $35.00 fee
‚û° Apply


====== DESCRIPTION ======

Target Gallery invites artists working in all visual media to submit to Memento Mori. According to the Merriam-Webster dictionary, ‚ÄúMemento mori‚Äù is the literal Latin translation for ‚Äú‚Äòremember (that you have) to die‚Äù. The purpose of this exhibition is to explore death as a concept and how it affects our lives. Through explorations of entropy/decay, ghosts and paranormal spirits, or personal experiences, this exhibit will contemplate how the inevitability of death impacts us all.

Exhibition Dates: September 28 ‚Äì November 3

Exhibition Juror: Laura Roulet, independent curator and writer


===== INSTRUCTIONS =====

All applications must be submitted through our online application via Submittable.com.

Apply and view guidelines:
https://torpedofactoryartcenter.submittable.com/submit/139805/memento-mori-at-target-gallery

For questions about the opportunity, contact Target Gallery at targetgallery@alexandriava.gov or call at 703-746-4590.

entry.title: 12/31 - Seeking Curatorial Proposals for LIC Arts Open Gallery at The Factory
entry.content:
LIC Arts Open
üìç Long Island City, NY, United States
üé® All Disciplines
üìÖ 12/31/2019 deadline
üí∞ unknown fee
‚û° Apply


====== DESCRIPTION ======

The LIC Arts Open Gallery is seeking proposals from curators for shows at our two galleries in The Factory LIC. The LIC Arts Open operates two gallery spaces at The Factory - the smaller gallery is approximately 50 x 50' and the larger one is over 6000 sq ft with one wall being over 100' long. Accordingly, we are seeking all kinds of proposals from solo shows all the way to large group exhibitions that could feature 40+ artists. Certain proposals from curators may have a stipend attached which depends on certain factors.

Artist's collectives and individual curators are all welcome to submit. Shows will usually run for a month, receptions are held on Thursdays.


===== INSTRUCTIONS =====

Please send your proposals indicating whether you are able to supply the necessary technology if working in the video or technology field. Please also tell us if any of the materials are toxic or hazardous. There are no restrictions on the subject matter.
